mapper.insert: insert into petitioner values(petitioner_seq.nextval, #{ id }, #{ password }, #{ name }, #{ contact }, #{ email }, #{ gender }, 0, #{ state }, 0, sysdate, to_date('20001212', 'YYYYMMDD'), #{ authKey }, #{ birthday })
mapper.select: select count(*) from petitioner where id = #{ value }
select count(*) from petitioner where email = #{ email } and authKey = #{ authKey }
select * from petitioner where email = #{ email } and authKey = #{ authKey }
mapper.update: update petitioner set state = 1 where id = #{ id }
